attributes.action: Decriminalization Of Cannabis In The UK Due To Medical Benifits And Findings
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis could actually be the safest drug available, after a study found it is actually 114 times less deadly than alcohol.

Overall, crime has fallen by 15% and murder has dropped by 50%.

Dope is actually less addictive than drinking coffee, Coffee’s addictive effects mean that it might actually be a more harmful drug than weed.

Just a few of the reasons that should be considered when this reaches debate.

Kind regards,
Cannabis Activists Across The UK
attributes.background:
Marijuana can kill cancer cells - US government has confirmed – can also shrink the most serious types of brain tumours.

If we legalised cannabis, up to £900m could be raised annually in taxes - The Institute for Economic Research.

Two Very Good Reasons...One That Will Interest The Government
